insert into sys_facilities_category( code, name, type, num, open_start_date, open_end_date, create_id, create_date, is_delete )values ( #{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{num}, #{openStartDate}, #{openEndDate}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{isDelete} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.select: select sfc.id,sfc.code,sfc.name,sfc.type,su.actual_name as create_name,sfc.num,sfc.create_date,su.tel,sfc.open_start_date,sfc.open_end_date from sys_facilities_category as sfc,sys_user as su where sfc.create_id = su.id and sfc.id = #{id} and sfc.is_delete = 1
mapper.update: update sys_facilities_category set name = #{name}, code = #{code}, open_start_date = #{openStartDate}, open_end_date = #{openEndDate}, modify_id = #{modifyId}, modify_date = #{modifyDate} where id = #{id}
